text: The vision of Obadiah. This is what the Lord1:1 The word translated “Lord” (mixed case) is “Adonai.” GOD1:1 When rendered in ALL CAPITAL LETTERS, “LORD” or “GOD” is the translation of God’s Proper Name. says about Edom. We have heard news from the LORD, and an ambassador is sent among the nations, saying, “Arise, and let’s rise up against her in battle.
